oai_dc:dc.dc:description: <jats:p>Arion lusitanicus (Mabille, 1868) appeared in Ukraine in 2007. Itsâ€™ areas gradually increase. It is necessary to wait their pest spread through Foreststeppe area climatic conditions in complex with biological and ecological peculiarities.</jats:p>
